categories: Category:Grand Moffs of the Imperial Remnant

nodes.text: Siralt was a Human male Grand Moff who was on board the Turbulent-class star destroyer Bloodfin during the Second Battle of Fondor. He didn't believe Darth Caedus could stay in power after the confrontation he and Cha Niathal had and believed him totally discredited after not recognizing Niathal's authority.
